title: Heil Honey I'm Home!
brief_description:
Controversial British television sitcom that was cancelled with only one episode.

In Berlin, 1938, Adolf Hitler and Eva Braun have a love-hate relationship with their Jewish neighbours in this bizarre spoof of ‘fifties American sitcoms.

Neville Chamberlain is coming to Germany and Adolf has to host. But will his Jewish neighbors wreck his plans to impress?

constellations_other.name: Undercutting extremism with absurdity
constellations_other.description: Taika Waititi's satirical performance as Adolf Hitler in Jojo Rabbit connects to a number of other portrayals that includes ill-fated (and conceived) TV shows, memes, high camp and cinema classics.
